com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.annotations

Class Polyline

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.annotations.Annotation
      • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.annotations.BasePointCollection
        • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.annotations.Polyline
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Annotation>
    Deprecated. 
    As of 7.0.0, use Mapbox Annotation Plugin instead

    @Deprecated
public final class Polyline
extends BasePointCollection
    Polyline is a geometry feature with an unclosed list of coordinates drawn as a line
